intro: Pistorinia brachyantha, commonly known as the narrow-leaf pistorinia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, lance-shaped leaves. Due to its ornamental value, it is cultivated in gardens and botanical collections.
